summary: Ever wanted to play as a draugr? Without the weird meshe glitch, or the annoying 3rd person floor walk, well I have fixed that, and I have even added it playable in the Race Menu.
descriptionHtml:
[u][i][b]Let\'s Play As A Draugr[/b][/i][/u]

Ever wanted to play as a draugr? Without the weird meshe glitch, or the annoying 3rd person floor walk, well I have fixed that, and I have even added it playable in the Race Menu.

[u]FAQ[/u]
Q - Why and or how is your draugr bloody and undead looking?
A - Sorry I have a Draugr texture mod enabled which makes all male draugr\'s more bloody and savage!
author: Enoomnai
